channel.title: Automation on Najam Sikander Awan

item.title: Continuous Integration & Deployment For .Net Projects
item.description: I have been involved with development of small and large web applications for quite sometime now. While using latest tools and technology for development I always felt my workflow is from ancient times. Recently I got much obsessed with automation, I thought to improve my development workflow. In my mind I knew I need to do something about build process, tests the build, deployment of latest build and notify team members that new code/build is available.
